mapper.insert: INSERT INTO facility (MT10ID, FCLTYNM, MT13CNT, FCLTYCHARTR, OPENDE, SEATSCALE, TELNO, RELATEURL, ADRES, LA, LO) VALUES (#{mt10id}, SUBSTRING_INDEX(#{fcltynm}, IF(LOCATE('[', #{fcltynm}), '[', '('), 1), #{mt13cnt}, SUBSTRING_INDEX(#{fcltychartr}, IF(LOCATE('[', #{fcltychartr}), '[', '('), 1), #{opende}, #{seatscale}, #{telno}, #{relateurl}, SUBSTRING_INDEX(#{adres}, IF(LOCATE('[', #{adres}), '[', '('), 1), #{la}, #{lo})
